options.responseText: Yep. You turned the vault from 'Eunuch Central' back into 'Slightly Less Fucked Central.' Congrats.

followUpOptions.optionText: I deserve a goddamn statue for this. Where’s my parade?
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh sure, lemme just call up Vault-Tec and have them carve your name into the 'Nut Savior of the Year' plaque. Maybe we can use the bodies of the dead Nut Suckers to build it—real poetic.

followUpOptions.optionText: So... do I get a reward? A medal? Maybe a back massage?
followUpOptions.responseText: Reward? Honey, your reward is waking up tomorrow with all your bits and pieces still where they belong. But if you’re really desperate for a back rub, I’m sure one of the survivors owes you big time.

Nice try, Casanova. But I’m not hopping into bed with pest-control just because you finally did your job. Maybe next time save us from something that doesn’t involve insects and genitals, and I’ll consider it.

followUpOptions.optionText: Okay, but real talk, why the hell do these things exist? Who’s into this?!
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, you wanna know who’s into this? Probably some Vault-Tec sicko who hasn’t seen a real pussy since pre-war.

auto_lines: Well, well, if it isn’t Vault 6969’s new ball-saving hero! Didn’t think you had it in you, but color me impressed.
